sentences.sContent: ...some of the finest photojournalism of the Civil Rights era.
sentences.sCn: ...一些民权运动时期最为优秀的摄影新闻。

words.tran: 摄影的；逼真的；（尤指记忆）详细准确的
上照的；适于摄影的；由光导致的

trans.tranOther: the job or activity of reporting news stories in newspapers and magazines using mainly photographs instead of words
